snippet: To a room of actors, taxi drivers and public-relations experts, Mayor Bill de Blasio pitched for a second term, urging participants to stand with him.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio presides over party celebrating his birthday at Brooklyn bowling alley, event that doubles as fund-raiser and early rally for his 2017 re-election campaign; it is first event de Blasio has hosted since his administration became focus of campaign finance investigations.
lead_paragraph: To a room of actors, taxi drivers and public-relations experts, Mayor Bill de Blasio pitched for a second term, urging participants to stand with him.

headline.main: Mayor de Blasio’s Birthday Party Serves as Re-election Rally
headline.print_headline: Mayor’s Party Serves as Re-election Rally
